title: Business Analyst_Amruta_Hexaware
description:
Position Name : Business Analyst – Insurance

Experience : 9 yrs to 12 yrs

Location : Pune/Mumbai/Chennai

Notice Period: Immediate to 30 Days

Job Description


Experience as a P&C insurance domain consultant / business analyst in IT or Insurance companies
Experience In InsureMo
Experience should include requirements gathering and analysis, elicitation, business process consulting, prototype development and testing
Understanding of the complete SDLC process and various methodologies
Ability to conduct walkthroughs, workshops and meetings involving various business stakeholders
Should be able to understands concepts related to database.
Management qualification with Insurance certifications like AINS, CPCU, ACII, LIII, AIII, FIII etc
Show more
